definitions.name: Binary
definitions.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization
with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>.
See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

definitions.name: Uint128

list_verification_schemes.description:
Returns a list of supported verification schemes.
No pagination - this is a short list.

verify_bls12_pairing_equality_g1.description: BLS12-381 pairing equality verification (where the key is an element of G1)

dst.description: The `dst` component used to hash the message to the curve

msg.description: The message that should be verified

pubkey.description: The public key point in its compressed format (element of G1)

signature.description: The signature point in its compressed format (element of G2)

verify_bls12_pairing_equality_g2.description: BLS12-381 pairing equality verification (where the key is an element of G2)

dst.description: The `dst` component used to hash the message to the curve

msg.description: The message that should be verified

pubkey.description: The public key point in its compressed format (element of G2)

signature.description: The signature point in its compressed format (element of G1)

public_key.description: Serialized compressed (33 bytes) or uncompressed (65 bytes) public key.

verify_ethereum_text.description:
Ethereum text verification (compatible to the eth_sign RPC/web3 endpoint).
This cannot be used to verify transaction.

See https://web3js.readthedocs.io/en/v1.2.0/web3-eth.html#sign

message.description:
Message to verify. This will be wrapped in the standard container
`"\x19Ethereum Signed Message:\n" + len(message) + message` before verification.

signature.description: Serialized signature. Fixed length format (64 bytes `r` and `s` plus the one byte `v`).

signer_address.description:
Signer address.
This is matched case insensitive, so you can provide check-summed and non-check-summed addresses. Checksums are not validated.

from.description: Ethereum address in hex format (42 characters, starting with 0x)

to.description: Ethereum address in hex format (42 characters, starting with 0x)

public_key.description: Serialized compressed (33 bytes) or uncompressed (65 bytes) public key.

public_keys.description: Serialized public keys. Tendermint format (32 bytes).

public_key.description: Serialized public key. Tendermint format (32 bytes).

r.description:
r component of signature

The representation of this component is a big-endian encoded 256bit integer

s.description:
s component of signature

The representation of this component is a big-endian encoded 256bit integer

x.description:
X coordinate of public key point

Untagged big-endian serialized byte sequence representing the X coordinate on the secp256r1 elliptic curve

y.description:
Y coordinate of public key point

Untagged big-endian serialized byte sequence representing the Y coordinate on the secp256r1 elliptic curve
